name: Pear and Arugula Smoothie With Ginger and Walnuts
description: Arugula may seem like a strange ingredient for a smoothie, but this combination is a real winner, a great lunchtime smoothie.
keywords: arugula, orange, pear, gluten-free, healthy, low cholesterol, low-sodium, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/2 ripe pear, cored and peeled (100 grams)
1 quarter-size piece of fresh ginger, peeled
2 to 4 tablespoons plain low-fat yogurt (to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender and blend for 1 full minute.
